any-time-without-notice.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.tldr: They can change the terms of service any time they see fit, even without notification to the user. Your use of the service supposedly constitutes acceptance of the changes in the terms.

eff-back-tell-user-no.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
eff-back-tell-user-no.title: No promise to inform you about data requests from governments

tosdr.tldr: The service has made no statement nor promised users to tell them about data sought by governments, thus not giving you a chance to defend yourself against government requests.

eff-back-transparency-data-no.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
eff-back-transparency-data-no.title: No transparency on law enforcement requests

tosdr.tldr: The service is not making clear to their users what standards and rules law enforcement must follow when they seek access to sensitive user data.
